text:
="preserve">Anthony Chisholm (April 9, 1943 – October 16, 2020) was an American actor. He was a nominated for a Tony Award for Best Supporting Actor in a play, for his role of Elder Joseph Barlow in August Wilson's "Radio Golf". He also performed on Broadway in August Wilson's "Gem of the Ocean". He was born in Cleveland, Ohio.
Chisholm died on October 16, 2020 in Montclair, New Jersey at the age of 77.
